Nighlight nodded but inside her she had a bad feeling. She looked to 
Hazel and the others and said "Follow me I'll show you the base... "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "This is Aerotaur.  I copy.  I'll be right there."  He turns 
to 
> Nightlight.  "Something has happened.  Can you help give these bots 
a tour?  
> I'll fill you in later ... when you can sit down."  He frowns and 
walks to 
> Windlord's location.
